Abracadabra!

If someone needed a name change due to someone in there past was Stalking them would that be acceptable reason as to warrant a minor rule break on the one per person thing? Just figured I ask for those who may have that issue? I do have that issue but this question is for anyone having anything similar. -Now known as PrymusOiadQaas- Sometimes we just get paired up with the worst kinds of people for no good reason.
It's never come up. I suppose we'd need some kind of verification.
